sentences.en: A young swan is called a cygnet.
His performance as King Lear was to be his swan - song before retiring.
sentences.cn: 他扮演李尔王是他退休前的告别演出.

sentences.en: I competed in the Commonwealth Games in Christchurch, which was my swan song.
sentences.cn: 我参加了在克赖斯特彻奇举办的英联邦运动会，那是我的告别比赛。

sentences.en: In Greek mythology, the god Zeus took the form of a swan to seduce Leda.
sentences.cn: 在希腊神话里，主神宙斯化作天鹅引诱了勒达。

sentences.en: Lord Swan was made a life peer in 1981.
sentences.cn: 斯旺勋爵于1981年受封终身贵族。

sentences.en: Pavlova glided across the stage like a swan on a lake.
sentences.cn: 帕夫洛娃就象湖上的天鹅那样滑过舞台.

sentences.en: Tchaikovsky writes several famous ballets. One of them be swan lake.
sentences.cn: 柴可夫斯基写过几部著名芭蕾舞曲. 其中之一是《天鹅湖》.

sentences.en: The chef had produced one of his most spectacular creations, a whole roasted swan.
sentences.cn: 这位厨师做出了他最拿手的好菜 -- 一整只烤天鹅.

sentences.en: The stately swan glides gracefully on the pond.
sentences.cn: 天鹅在池面上优美地游动.

sentences.en: The swan flapped its wings noisily.
sentences.cn: 天鹅大声地拍打着翅膀。

sentences.en: The swan swam gracefully in the pond of the park.
sentences.cn: 天鹅在公园池塘中优雅地游水.

sentences.en: The symbols of Apollo were the wolf, swan, raven, stag, dolphin, laurel, and lyre.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗的象征物是狼 、 天鹅 、 渡鸦 、 雄鹿 、 海豚 、 桂冠和竖琴.

sentences.en: The team's mascot is a giant swan.
sentences.cn: 这个队的吉祥物是只大天鹅。

sentences.en: They billeted in White Swan Hotel.
sentences.cn: 他们在白天鹅旅社住下了.

sentences.en: Three swimming birds are the swan, the duck, and the goose.
sentences.cn: 天鹅 、 鸭子和鹅是三种会游水的禽类.

sentences.en: Toads pursuit of swans, swan disdain said: If I as long as you die!
sentences.cn: 癞蛤蟆追求天鹅，天鹅不屑地说：我要是长成你这样早去死了！

sentences.en: You are one of us. You are a swan!
sentences.cn: 你是我们中的一个。你是一只天鹅！

phrases.tran_cn: 绝笔，最后的作品；天鹅临死时的叫声

trans.tran_en: a large white bird with a long neck that lives on rivers and lakes
